title: Tucker (Ga.) at Blackman
content: Blackman student Blake Hogan, waves an American flag before the football game against Tucker as they get ready for the game to start. Several Blackman students painted letters on their chest that spelled out God Bless America,  in rememberance of 9-11, on Frida,y Sept. 11, 2015.  Helen Comer / Gannett Tennessee
